Module project
Package controller

Class CommandLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CommandLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandContainer, CommandLauncherInterface, java.rmi.Remote
    public class CommandLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandLauncherInterface
    A class that implements a generic behavior for a command executor. Creates thread that executes the commands. If no commands are put in the queue, the command executor is in a wait state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CommandLauncher​(GameManager gameManager, JsonCreator jsonCreator)
      creates a command executor with the given match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLauncher

        public CommandLauncher​(GameManager gameManager,
                       JsonCreator jsonCreator)
        creates a command executor with the given match. Also the commandQueue is set empty and the pool is a cached pool
        Parameters:
        gameManager - the game in which the players are playing

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand()
        Waits for the command queue to fill. Takes the command and launch a new thread the executes it's method. If the thread is interrupted, the executor shuts down
        Specified by:
        executeCommand in interface CommandLauncherInterface
